sentences.english: When she came back, she did her summer exercise first.
sentences.chinese: 當她回到家中之後，她首先做了暑假作業。

sentences.english: During summer vacations some teachers attend seminars at college.
sentences.chinese: 暑假裏，一些教師在學院裏參加研究班。

sentences.english: The classes of our university closed for the summer vacation.
He goes scuba-diving at Kenting every summer.
sentences.chinese: 他每年暑假都到墾丁去潛水。

sentences.english: When I got up, she has already finished her handwriting task and school assignment.
sentences.chinese: 當我起來的時候，她已經完成了書法作業和暑假作業。

sentences.english: Bankers, financiers and fund managers are among the biggest losers.
sentences.chinese: 銀行家，金融家，和基金經理是最大的暑假。
現在是夏天，學校正放暑假。

sentences.english: When is your school getting out for the summer?
sentences.chinese: 你們學校什麼時候放暑假？

sentences.english: So are you planning to spend the summer sweating it out in Brooklyn?
sentences.chinese: 那你的暑假就準備在布魯克林苦熬嘍？

sentences.english: Come to my house and you won't have to pay for anything.
sentences.chinese: 暑假你跟我回家，你就可以在我家白喫白住。

sentences.english: Summer vacation was not fruitful, but also have a white cross.
sentences.chinese: 暑假過得不敢說收穫頗豐，倒也未嘗白過。

sentences.english: Oddly, I spent most of that summer watching TV.
sentences.chinese: 奇怪的是，我那個暑假基本上都在看電視。

sentences.english: Which do you enjoy to spend your weekends, fishing or watching TV?
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡做什麼來度暑假，去海邊還是呆在家？

sentences.english: Jeff Van Gundy has insisted that Yao's summer workload has not limited his growth.
sentences.chinese: JVG堅持說姚明的暑假作業並沒有限制他的成長。

sentences.english: In this summer vacation, they visited Jin Gang mountain.
sentences.chinese: 今年暑假，他們還一起遊覽了井岡山。

definition: foundation of a University or College/school opening/the start of a new term
third year in junior middle school
to have a holiday or vacation
2nd year in junior middle school/2nd day of a lunar month/2nd day of lunar New Year
